sourcesContent: import{jsx as i,jsxs as n}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{translate as t}from"@aws-amplify/ui";import{useAuthenticator as e}from"../hooks/useAuthenticator/index.js";import{Tabs as r,TabItem as o}from"../../../primitives/Tabs/Tabs.js";import{View as s}from"../../../primitives/View/View.js";import{SignIn as a}from"../SignIn/SignIn.js";import{SignUp as c}from"../SignUp/SignUp.js";import{RouteContainer as m}from"../RouteContainer/RouteContainer.js";const g=({className:g,hideSignUp:p,variation:l})=>{const{route:u,toSignIn:j,toSignUp:d}=e((i=>[i.route,i.toSignIn,i.toSignUp]));return i(m,Object.assign({className:g,variation:l},{children:p?i(s,Object.assign({"data-amplify-router-content":""},{children:"signIn"===u&&i(a,{})})):n(r,Object.assign({indicatorPosition:"top",currentIndex:"signIn"===u?0:1,spacing:"equal",justifyContent:"center",onChange:()=>"signIn"===u?d():j()},{children:[i(o,Object.assign({title:t("Sign In")},{children:i(s,Object.assign({"data-amplify-router-content":""},{children:"signIn"===u&&i(a,{})}))})),i(o,Object.assign({title:t("Create Account")},{children:i(s,Object.assign({"data-amplify-router-content":""},{children:"signUp"===u&&i(c,{})}))}))]}))}))};export{g as SignInSignUpTabs};
